Docs.summary: NUnit is a unit-testing framework for all .Net languages.

remarks.para: Initially ported from JUnit, the current version, 2.0 is the second major release of this xUnit based unit testing tool for NET. It is written entirely in C# and has been completely redesigned to take advantage of many .NET language features, for example custom attributes and other reflection related capabilities. NUnit brings xUnit to all .NET languages.
